attributes.action: Stop councils preventing access to restricted byways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A number of councils, including Caerphilly CBC, ARE PREVENTING access to restricted byways by horsedrawn vehicles. This is illegal, and not in accordance with the NERC act. They have been instructed to cease this action by the Welsh Assembly, but are ignoring the instruction

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
